Description: Necklace: a long string of a few green, many pale-blue and some black glazed composition disc beads and short barrels.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: F. Ll. Griffith, 'Liverpool Annals of Archaeology and Anthropology 8 (Liverpool, 1921), 75, describes C-Group jewellery from this cemetery without specific mention of this burial.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (376)
